entry.title: $2400 // NO FEE **HUGE 1BR in Bushwick** first month free!
entry.content:
Huge * 1 bedroom * apartment with a massive private terrace
Prime Bushwick - Amazing deal!

This space is a gift you give yourself. Refreshing and distinctive, the interior of this one bedroom one bath shimmers from the newly renovated kitchen to the private outdoor terrace. Rare views of the city give this top floor unit an edge. This new construction has curb appeal in the prime area of Bushwick.

apartment features:
- Massive private terrace with city views
- True hardwood floors throughout
- Stainless steal appliances
- Granite counter top
- Great closet space
- Fully tiled bathroom
- Large windows
- Central air conditioning.

** 1 MONTH FREE WHEN SIGNING 12 MONTH LEASE!
GROSS PRICE $2,400/ NET PRICE $2,200

building features: virtual doorman, Laundry room.
pets welcome - guarantors accepted
short walk to subway lines
call / text / email for a viewing today
Libby show contact info
